Minimum margin amount to be taken on a single trade. If the calculated margin amount is less than this then this amount will be charged as the margin for that particular trade.
The number of lots of the underlying transaction.

This field defines a percentage increase or reduction that will be applied to all margin figures calculated by this routine.
